H0.text: How many James Bond films did Pierce Brosnan do. 2

H1.text: How many James Bond films did Pierce Brosnan do. 5

H2.text: How many James Bond films did Pierce Brosnan do. 1

H3.text: How many James Bond films did Pierce Brosnan do. 4

A4.text: Brosnan starred as Bond four times from 1995 to 2002: GoldenEye, Tomorrow Never Dies, The World Is Not Enough, and Die Another Day.
